synonyms.synonym: Nuclear receptor subfamily 1 group H member 4

protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Ligand-activated transcription factor. Receptor for bile acids such as chenodeoxycholic acid, lithocholic acid and deoxycholic acid. Represses the transcription of the cholesterol 7-alpha-hydroxylase gene (CYP7A1) through the induction of NR0B2 or FGF19 expression, via two distinct mechanisms. Activates the intestinal bile acid-binding protein (IBABP). Activates the transcription of bile salt export pump ABCB11 by directly recruiting histone methyltransferase CARM1 to this locus

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
